Package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.exceptions

Exceptions thrown by operations of the Bo2 framework.

See:
          Description

Exception Summary
CouldNotBeginException Exception thrown by a TransactionManager when it fails to begin a transaction.
CouldNotCommitException Exception thrown by a TransactionManager when it fails to commit a transaction.
CouldNotDelistException Exception thrown by a TransactionManager when it fails to de-list a resource.
CouldNotEnlistException Exception thrown by a TransactionManager when it fails to enlist a resource.
CouldNotRollbackException This Exception is thrown by a TransactionManager when he fails to rollback a transaction.
DataAccessException Exception that occurs during data storage operations.
DataException DataException that occurs during data access operations.
DataOperationNotSupportedException This exception should be thrown upon invocation of any method of a data storage layer class that has not been implemented.
InitializationException An InitializationException is thrown when a Worker fails to be initialized.
LogicException LogicException occurs due to the violation of a logical condition.
NoTransactionManagerException Exception thrown when the provider does not provide a TransactionManager.
PoNotFoundException Exception thrown by data storage layer operations that failed to find a persistent object.
ProviderCreationException Exception thrown when the provider can't be created by a RuntimeCommand.
RuleException Exception thrown by a Rule.
TransactionManagerException Abstract base class for all exceptions thrown by a TransactionManager.
UnexpectedException This Exception is thrown when an unexpected Throwable is thrown during an operation.
WebServiceException Exception that is thrown from web services.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.exceptions Description

Exceptions thrown by operations of the Bo2 framework.
The Bo2 framework demands to hide the technology used for its implementation. Methods of Bo2 classes throw predefined Exceptions. Exceptions thrown by underlying implementation technologies as JDBC, java.io, Hibernate etc must be encapsulated inside Bo2 exceptions.
